homepage.title: HEAR-UI
homepage.subtitle: AI-Assisted Decision Support for Cochlear Implants
homepage.description: A web application that visualizes AI-powered predictions to support clinicians in assessing cochlear implant suitability and expected outcomes.
homepage.search_patients_text: Quickly find patients by ID, name or other criteria to review their data.
homepage.search_patients_image_alt: Illustration representing searching through patient records.
homepage.create_patient_text: Register a new patient and enter their clinical information for analysis.
homepage.create_patient_image_alt: Illustration representing adding a new patient.
homepage.prediction_text: Explore risk scores, model outputs and performance for your patients.
homepage.prediction_image_alt: Illustration representing risk prediction and analytics.
homepage.welcome_text: Welcome to Hear-UI, a project for predicting hearing loss.

error.name: Name needs to be at least 2 characters.

result.title: Prediction result:
result.probability: Probability that a cochlear implant is recommended.

description.recommended: Based on the current audiological and clinical features, the AI model predicts a high probability that a cochlear implant will be beneficial.
description.not_recommended: Based on the current audiological and clinical features, the AI model predicts a low probability that a cochlear implant will be beneficial.

graph.title: Decision threshold
graph.description: Values above 50% are generally considered suitable candidates for implantation.

about.title: About the Prediction Models
about.description: This page provides access to the prediction models used in this application. You can view model cards to understand how they work, their performance, and their limitations.

step1.title: Step 1
step1.description: Find an existing patient using the search.

step2.title: Step 2
step2.description: Or create a new patient if they are not in the system.

step3.title: Step 3
step3.description: Navigate to the patient's detail page and verify their information.

step4.title: Step 4
step4.description: Click 'Generate Prediction' to see the model's output.
